abstract: Some works on view at ArtsWestchester's Arts Exchange in White Plains are also included in show at Peekskill Clay Studios; show presents predominantly functional pottery made of different colors, clay and kiln (Metropolitan/Westchester).
snippet: A pottery show and sale in Peekskill illustrates the breadth of effects that can be achieved with different conceptual and technical approaches.
lead_paragraph: A pottery show and sale in Peekskill illustrates the breadth of effects that can be achieved with different conceptual and technical approaches.

headline.seo: Crafts Are Celebrated at Peekskill Clay Studios
